mapper.insert: insert into plms_repayment_schedule_detail_tmp ( id, code, status, create_date, modify_date, repayment_schedule_detail_code, current_period, total_period, repayment_date, amount, principal, interest, service_fee, overdue, service_fee_penalty, repaymented_principal, repaymented_interest, repaymented_service_fee, repaymented_overdue, repaymented_service_fee_penalty, repayment_schedule_detail_status, paid_code, repayment_schedule_detail_create_date, repayment_schedule_detail_modify_date, schedule_code, principal_account_code, interest_account_code, total_overdue_days, service_fee_total_overdue_days, bail, bail_penalty, repaymented_bail, repaymented_bail_penalty) select null, uuid(), '1', SYSDATE(), SYSDATE(), prsd.code, prsd.current_period, prsd.total_period, prsd.repayment_date, prsd.amount, prsd.principal, prsd.interest, prsd.service_fee, prsd.overdue, prsd.service_fee_penalty, prsd.repaymented_principal, prsd.repaymented_interest, prsd.repaymented_service_fee, prsd.repaymented_overdue, prsd.repaymented_service_fee_penalty, prsd.status, prsd.paid_code, prsd.create_date, prsd.modify_date, prsd.schedule_code, prsd.principal_account_code, prsd.interest_account_code, prsd.total_overdue_days, prsd.service_fee_total_overdue_days, prsd.bail, prsd.bail_penalty, prsd.repaymented_bail, prsd.repaymented_bail_penalty from plms_repayment_schedule_detail prsd, plms_paid_info ppi where prsd.status != '00' and ppi.status != '00' and prsd.paid_code = ppi.code and ppi.contract_code = #{contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

insert into plms_repayment_schedule_detail_change_control ( id, code, status, create_date, modify_date, contract_code, change_status, change_um_id) values( null, uuid(), '1', SYSDATE(), SYSDATE(), #{contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{changeStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{changeUmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE plms_repayment_schedule_detail_tmp prsd SET prsd.status = '0' WHERE prsd.status != '0' and prsd.paid_code in ( select code from plms_paid_info ppi where ppi.contract_code = #{contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ppi.status != '00')
UPDATE plms_repayment_schedule_detail_change_control prsdcc SET prsdcc.status = '0' WHERE prsdcc.status != '0' and prsdcc.contract_code = #{contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT pbu.code AS lockOwerCode, pbu.name AS lockOwerName FROM plms_repayment_schedule_detail_change_control prsdcc, plms_backend_user pbu WHERE prsdcc.contract_code = #{contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND prsdcc.status != '0' AND pbu.status != '0' AND prsdcc.change_um_id = pbu.code

select prsdt.code as "scheduleDetailTmpCode", prsdt.repayment_schedule_detail_code as "repaymentScheduleDetailCode", prsdt.current_period as "currentPeriod", date_format(prsdt.repayment_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "repaymentDate", prsdt.principal as "principal", prsdt.interest as "interest", prsdt.overdue as "overdue", prsdt.service_fee as "serviceFee", prsdt.service_fee_penalty as "serviceFeePenalty", prsdt.bail as "bail", prsdt.bail_penalty as "bailPenalty", prsdt.amount as "amount", (case when (prsdt.repayment_schedule_detail_status = '02' ) then (case when (prsdt.overdue <= 0 and prsdt.service_fee_penalty <= 0) then '04' when (prsdt.overdue > 0 or prsdt.service_fee_penalty > 0) then '03' end) when (prsdt.repayment_schedule_detail_status = '01' ) then '01' end) as "statusCode",/*状态编码*/ (case when (prsdt.repayment_schedule_detail_status = '02' ) then (case when (prsdt.overdue <= 0 and prsdt.service_fee_penalty <= 0) then '正常' when (prsdt.overdue > 0 or prsdt.service_fee_penalty > 0) then '逾期中' end) when (prsdt.repayment_schedule_detail_status = '01' ) then '已结清' end) as "statusName"/* 状态 */ from plms_repayment_schedule_detail_tmp prsdt where prsdt.status != '0' and prsdt.paid_code = #{paidCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by prsdt.repayment_date

select prsdt.code as "code", prsdt.current_period as "currentPeriod", date_format(prsdt.repayment_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "repaymentDate", prsdt.principal as "principal", prsdt.interest as "interest", prsdt.overdue as "overdue", prsdt.service_fee as "serviceFee", prsdt.service_fee_penalty as "serviceFeePenalty", prsdt.bail as "bail", prsdt.bail_penalty as "bailPenalty", prsdt.amount as "amount" from plms_repayment_schedule_detail prsdt where prsdt.status != '00' and prsdt.paid_code = #{paidCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by prsdt.repayment_date
mapper.insert: insert into plms_repayment_schedule_detail_tmp ( id, code, status, create_date, modify_date, repayment_schedule_detail_code, current_period, total_period, repayment_date, amount, principal, interest, service_fee, bail, overdue, service_fee_penalty, bail_penalty, repaymented_principal, repaymented_interest, repaymented_service_fee, repaymented_overdue, repaymented_service_fee_penalty, repayment_schedule_detail_status, paid_code, repayment_schedule_detail_create_date, repayment_schedule_detail_modify_date, schedule_code, principal_account_code, interest_account_code, total_overdue_days) select null, uuid(), '1', SYSDATE(), SYSDATE(), uuid(), prsd.current_period, prsd.total_period, #{repaymentDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, (IFNULL(#{principal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},0) + IFNULL(#{interest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},0) + IFNULL(#{serviceFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},0) + IFNULL(#{bail,jdbcType=DECIMAL},0) ), IFNULL(#{principal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},0), IFNULL(#{interest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},0), IFNULL(#{serviceFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},0), IFNULL(#{bail,jdbcType=DECIMAL},0), 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, '02', prsd.paid_code, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE(), null, prsd.principal_account_code, prsd.interest_account_code, 0 from plms_repayment_schedule_detail prsd where prsd.status != '00' and prsd.paid_code = #{paidCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1
mapper.update:
UPDATE plms_repayment_schedule_detail_tmp prsd
prsd.principal = IFNULL(#{principal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},0),
prsd.interest = IFNULL(#{interest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},0),
prsd.service_fee = IFNULL(#{serviceFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},0),
prsd.bail = IFNULL(#{bail,jdbcType=DECIMAL},0),
prsd.amount = (IFNULL(#{principal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},0) + IFNULL(#{interest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},0) + IFNULL(#{serviceFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},0) )
WHERE prsd.status != '0' and prsd.code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
